name: Blind-Fire
description:
Control

Move: WASD + Mouse

Jump/Double Jump: Space

Toggle Light: E

Shoot: Left Click

Dash: Right Click or Left Shift

A game of Light vs Dark! Platform and dash through the level while avoiding and shooting the ghosts that haunt the night. Ghosts are only visible when the lights are off, however turning off the lights hides the platforms. Reach the end triangle to progress to the next level. There are 4 levels! Have fun :D
